issues: Lack of access control for functions that modify state.
No payment processing function integrated to manage actual fund transfers.
Events emitted do not provide sufficient context for external tracking.
recommendations: Implement access control (e.g., Ownable pattern) to restrict who can call state-changing functions.
Integrate payment processing logic to handle actual transactions instead of just emitting an event.
Enhance event emissions to include transaction IDs or more data for better traceability.
